v1.headline: I Help Founders & Business Coaches Grow their Client Base with my Personal Branding Strategy System [Branding + Strategy + Content Creation] Personal Brand Strategist & Social Media Marketer | DM me BRAND to get started!
v1.about:
90% of Linkedin users never generate inbound leads. Yet, the top 10% are
→ landing clients
→ building authority
→ growing their businesses

You’re posting on LinkedIn, but…

→ Your profile isn’t attracting the right clients.
→ Your content isn’t getting engagement.
→ You’re not getting inbound leads.

You’re tired of seeing others grow their personal brands while you struggle to get noticed.

But what if…
↳ Your content positioned you as an authority in your industry?
↳ Your LinkedIn profile turned visitors into high-quality leads?
↳ You had a personal brand that made you stand out from competitors?

As a Personal Brand Strategist, I help tech founders and business coaches build their LinkedIn presence and attract ideal clients.

Here’s how I do it:
Content Strategy = Building a plan that aligns with your brand and attracts engagement.
Content Creation = Writing posts that establish your authority.
Profile Optimization = Making your LinkedIn profile a lead magnet.
Community Building = Growing your network with the right people.
Designs or visuals = Eye-catching designs that stop the scroll.

Results:

⪼ Helped clients generate inbound leads with less than 1,000 followers.
⪼ Grew brand impressions to 28,000+ in one month.
⪼ Created content that positioned clients as thought leaders in their niche.

Just DM me "Personal Brand"
Let's get you ahead and build YOU as a brand!
